Flawless presentation in prized pocket.
Encircled by enchanting garden scenery, this charming and spacious double-storey family home built in 1987, is set on a sizable 871m2 (approx.) block and takes up its position in one of Croydon's most prized locales, only a short stroll from thriving Croydon Central offering an array of amenities.
Emanating a sense of refined sophistication, every inch of this four bedroom residence has been thoughtfully planned and executed to ensure a quality lifestyle is enjoyed. Upon entry, the formal L-shaped lounge and dining feels immediately inviting, featuring charming bay windows to draw in natural light. Premium European appliances in the kitchen result in a pleasurable cooking experience, showcasing a 900mm Ilve electric oven, gas stove and Miele dishwasher. This idyllic family haven has been constructed with enduring quality that has withstood the test of time.
